desc: A safe space for LGBTQIA+ in Washington, DC. café/bar/dance boutique has arrived! as you are (AYA) exists to hold and cultivate a safe space for the LGBTQIA+ community. While this community is our priority, everybody is welcome. We encourage all to come as you are & lovingly celebrate our magnificent culture.

layout.text: As You Are is home! Please come in and visit. AYA offers coffee, food, drinks & FREE WiFi.
Covid precautions: We are requiring masks when patrons are walking through the space and ordering at the bars. Staff will be masked and negative tests are required before all shifts.
